title: RP purchasing Bugged

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I have recently ran into a bug with the ingame shop. I have been purchasing RP with my phone, and i exceded the maximum purchases aloud in a day... _5 days ago_, i have been waiting a long time for it to go away. So could you please resolve this issue im very conserned about this bug.

**Kind Reguards
~Dylan**

replies.body:
Hey there,

Due to this being an account specific inquiry we on the boards are unable to assist you with your issue.

Your best bet in this situation would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they can look into this issue further for you :)
